name: 3dVecRGB_to_HSL
author: AFNI Developers
description: Convert a 3-brick RGB (red, green, blue) data set to an HSL (hue, saturation, luminance) one.

inputs.description: Input RGB vector file of three bricks, presumably each having values in the interval [0,1].
inputs.name: Input RGB Vector File

inputs.description: Whole brain mask within which to calculate things. Otherwise, data should be masked already.
inputs.name: Mask File

inputs.description: Scalar file (single brick) which will be appended to the output file, mainly aimed at loading in an FA data set for tract volume coloration.
inputs.name: Input Scalar File
